analysis: The project is a website about black holes with a cosmic theme. The current UI needs enhancements to fully reflect the black hole topic with animated objects, slides, and a cohesive theme. The CSS and JavaScript files are incomplete, and the HTML structure needs to be finalized to include all necessary sections and interactive elements.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Ensure the theme is cohesive and immersive.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.

Fix syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented. Add event listeners and functionality for the new buttons added in test-website/index.html. Ensure smooth transitions and user-friendly interactions.
